description: I am a retired pedagogue from Newyork. I am a widower with no encumbrances. I am interested in Reading; Writing (all kinds);Mountain Climbing; Philosophy; UFO's; Parapsychology; Pen friendship and some more.Have been penpaling since the ageof 9. I am well travelled Internationally and have lived in 4 continents. Seeking sincere friends from both women and men.
